General.Name: OOOOO Entertainment Commerce Limited
General.Description: OOOOO Entertainment Commerce Limited operates a technology platform that enables retailers, brands, and entrepreneurs to share product-based opinions directly to consumers through live, interactive, and shoppable videos. Its platform also provides gamification and social features that rewards the community for growing the user base. In addition, the company offers Shiller, a web-based live video and audio technology platform to enable the marketing of digital assets. The company was formerly known as Evermount Ventures Inc. and changed its name to OOOOO Entertainment Commerce Limited in July 2021. OOOOO Entertainment Commerce Limited was founded in 2019 and is headquartered in Manchester, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Citibase Oxford, New Barclay House, Oxford, United Kingdom
